Say Hi

This is a small website, with very few things on it. If you ended up here, we’d probably have an interesting conversation and you should say hi. You can reach me by email at jablevine@gmail.com or put some time on my Calendly. I am very good at responding to email, but I only check my inbox twice a day; if I haven’t replied within a couple of days you should follow up, repeatedly. You can also give me anonymous feedback here.

I am in Oxford most of the year, and would be very happy to meet in person!


Say Hi - Joseph Levine
